comment: Browser MCP Server Configuration for Cursor
instructions: 1. Update the paths above to match your system
2. For macOS/Linux: Keep the paths as shown
3. For Windows: Use backslashes and .exe, e.g. 'C:\...\python.exe'
4. Copy the 'mcpServers' section to your Cursor settings
5. Restart Cursor to enable the MCP server
6. Claude will now have access to browser tools
